ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Expands factors, characters and other eligible classes into dummy/indicator variables.
Expands factors, characters and other eligible classes into dummy/indicator variables.

name: r-dummies
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.5.6' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-dummies
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/dummies_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/dummies/dummies_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 7551bc2df0830b98c53582cac32145d5ce21f5a61d97e2bb69fd848e3323c805

build:
  number: 7
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('dummies')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('dummies')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://www.decisionpatterns.com
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Expands factors, characters and other eligible classes into dummy/indicator variables.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - StatMixedML
    - uday1889

# Package: dummies
# Type: Package
# Title: Create dummy/indicator variables flexibly and efficiently
# Version: 1.5.6
# Date: 2012-06-14
# Author: Christopher Brown
# Maintainer: Christopher Brown <chris.brown@decisionpatterns.com>
# Depends: utils
# Description: Expands factors, characters and other eligible classes into dummy/indicator variables.
# URL: http://www.decisionpatterns.com
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# LazyLoad: no
# Packaged: 2012-06-13 20:29:53 UTC; cbrown
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2012-06-14 18:17:00
# NeedsCompilation: no
